EmailTemplate.name: 04-21-22 Hos BiWeekly Newsletter.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Tools and Resources
EmailTemplate.textOnly: April 21, 2022 Sales Engineering Update: Your Tools and Resources Don’t forget about all of the tools and resources available to you! - NCRU <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/NCR/default2.aspx]]> for implementation guides, FFG’s - OKM <[[https://okm.corp.ncr.com/infocenter/index?page=home]]> for technical documentation - Aloha-Update <[[https://www.alohaupdates.com/RadiantUpdatePortal/SignIn.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fRadiantUpdatePortal%2fDefault.aspx]]> for product stack - Seismic <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/app#/profileview/1b8ad09d-6094-4388-a5ec-b72bf41e68bd/landing]]> for sales, marketing, and product resources Partner Enablement Call Schedule We will be switching up the cadence of our Partner Enablement Calls between April and May. Our next calls are as follows at 1:30PM ET: May 6, May 20, June 3, June 17. If you or a colleague needs to be added to our Partner Enablement Calls, please reach out to your Channel Account Manager or Jessica Weatherford (Jessica.Weatherford@ncr.com <[[mailto:Jessica.Weatherford@ncr.com]]>). <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
